ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hldi.1 | |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) |

| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_nvdir | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A + B ) S C ) = ( ( A S C ) G ( B S C ) ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( U e. CHilOLD /\ ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A + B ) S C ) = ( ( A S C ) G ( B S C ) ) ) |
